name: Football Horror
description:
Ludum Dare entry, theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/$89242

Football + Survival Horror = Football Horror!

You are playing football game, when accidentally zombie apocalypse happened! You need to survive as long as you can, while scoring goals, and hitting zombies with the ball.

Controls:

  • AWSD - movement
  • Space - jump
  • Shift - sprint
  • Left mouse - ball shot

After kicking ball out of stadium it will appear in the center of the field..!
